titles.title: Economic Development and Technology Workforce Enhancement Act of 2002
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to stimulate economic development by enhancing the availability and benefits of small issue bonds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/27/2002--Introduced. Economic Development and Technology Workforce Enhancement Act of 2002 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code by: (1) increasing from $10 million to $20 million the amount of qualified small issue bonds allowed for facilities to be used by certain principal users and; (2) expanding the list of exceptions from termination for technology facilities to include any software development facility, biotechnology facility, and any other technology-related research facility.
